titleStmt.title: The foundation of the universitie of Cambridge, vvith a catalogue of the principall founders and speciall benefactours of all the colledges, and totall number of students, magistrates and officers therein being, anno 1634.
titleStmt.author: Scot, John, the elder.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge, for John Scot the Elder, and to be sold over against the Holborn Conduit, and the house of Robert Peak,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.

person.persName: John Scot the Elder, and to be
the Printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge
